Commands.Meltdown (Chant): Raises BRV based on Attack then raises it by 1.5  Grants 「Small Attack Up」 for 3 turns and 「Small Max BRV Up」 for 5 turns  Low Action Delay
Commands.Meltdown+: HP attack with low Action Delay  Inflicts 「Small Defense Down」 for 2 turns
Commands.Meteor (Chant): Raises BRV based on Attack then raises it by 1.5  Grants 「Small Attack Up」 for 3 turns and 「Small Speed Up」 for 5 turns  Low Action Delay
Commands.Meteor+: 10-HIT BRV+HP attack with low Action Delay  Inflicts 「Small Speed Down」 for 2 turns
Commands.Set Magicite Boost: Grants 3 additional stacks of 「Magicite」 (max 9 stacks)  Tremendously raises Max BRV  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Riot Blade: 3-HIT BRV+HP attack  Potency increases as HP goes down

Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits
Passives.Meltdown Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Meltdown (Chant)
Passives.Kill BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after killing an enemy
Passives.Meltdown BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using  Meltdown (Chant)
Passives.Meteor Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Meteor+
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy
Passives.Trance: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense if HP is Max when the final battle starts
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Greatly raises Attack and slightly raises Speed while buffed
Passives.Meltdown Extend: Meltdown (Chant)  use +1When using  Meltdown (Chant) :- Slightly raises the BRV gain based on Attack- Slightly improves the  Max BRV Up  EffectWhen using  Meltdown+ - After the BRV gains, deals a 1-HIT magic BRV attack- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Grants 5 stacks of  Magicite  (max 9 stacks)When  Magicite  stack is 5 or higher:- Turns  Meltdown+  to  Magicite Meltdown+  with the following effects: + Increase number of BRV hits to 2 + Tremendously raises its total potency + Deals 50% HP damage to other enemies + Costs 4 stacks of  Magicite When  Magicite  stack is 1 or higher- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+  with the following effects: + Increase number of BRV hits to 2 + Moderately raises its total potency + Grants 3 stacks of  Magicite  (max 9 stacks) Magicite  has the following effects:- Grants BRV Regen- BRV regen potency does not change based on stacks
Passives.Buff Base&Boost: Moderately raises Initial BRV and Max BRV while buffed
Passives.Meteor Extend: Meteor (chant)  use +1When using  Meteor+ :- Increase number of BRV hits to 15- Tremendously raises its total potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Grants 5 stacks of  Magicite When  Magicite  stack is 5 or higher:- Turns  Meteor+  to  Magicite Meteor+  with the following effects: + Turns the BRV hits to AoE + Moderately raises its total potency + Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target + BRV stolen can overflow up to 180% Max BRV + Costs 4 stacks of  Magicite When  Magicite  stack is 1 or higher:- Turns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+  with the following effects: + 1-HIT magic BRV+HP attack + BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV + Grants 3 stacks of  Magicite
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Set Magicite Boost Extend: When using  Set Magicite Boost :- Slightly improves Max BRV Up effect

Weapons.Enhancer CP: 35: When using  Meteor+ ,  Magicite Meteor+ :- Raises BRV potencyWhen using  Meteor (Chant) ,  Magicite Meteor (Chant) :- Extends the duration of  Attack Up  and Speed Down
Weapons.Organyx CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Riot Blade
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Set Magitek Boost  use +1Grants +2 stacks of  Magitek
Weapons.Sword of a Fey Maiden CP: 15: Moderately raises BRV gained after using  Meltdown (Chant)  and  Magicite Meltdown (Chant) Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Meteor+  and  Magicite Meteor+
Weapons.Falchion CP: 15: When using  Meltdown+ ,  Magicite Meltdown+ :- Raises BRV by 1.2When using  Meltdown (Chant) ,  Magicite Meltdown (Chant) :- Extends the duration of  Attack Up  and  Defense Down
